alert.note: Alert for Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued July 15 at 11:03AM PDT until July 15 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... The National Weather Service in Elko has issued a * Flash Flood Watch for portions of eastern Nevada and south central Nevada, including the following areas, in eastern Nevada, White Pine County. In south central Nevada, Northeastern Nye County. * From 2 PM PDT this afternoon through 11 PM PDT this evening. * Slow moving thunderstorms can produce heavy rainfall in the mountains leading to high flows in drainages, dry washes, and dry creek beds. * Flood water may contain contain dangerous debris and sweep away vehicles and people. If flooding is encountered turn around and don`t drown as roads can easily wash out.
info.instruction: A flash flood watch means that conditions may develop that lead to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation. You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action should flash flood warnings be issued.

area.areaDesc: Northeastern Nye County; White Pine County
